parameters: \lsoffThe statue moved aside, revealing an entrance!
Welcome to the Giannan colony of Tabnath!
Ah, a sister of ours... \|But by your garb and company...
Yes, I am a Knight of Gianna.

\!
Misguided or not, you are still a sister of ours.
Regardless, you may rest here if you like - and we have a visiting merchant among us as well.
Greetings to you. Welcome to our camp.
You may rest here if you like - and we have a visiting merchant among us as well.
No matter the case, our Forestkin sisters and their friends are always welcome in our camps.
Some of us are more wary of Giannans than others.
But worry not - no harm shall come to you up here.
You found her~! I thought I'd be wandering through these mountains for ages!
She's looking a bit... wooden, though.
\!Hmm... I'm not too sure what to do about that...
Oh well! At least she's safe!

\!
Here, take this! I've been hoping to get rid of my ill-gotten Councilor gains anyway...
I- I mean... Well, I'm not a Councilor anymore, right?
Actually, though... I came here looking for one of the other Counci-- er, former Councilors.
Jatek - you know, the sporty one? - she told me she heard about some treasure or something out this way and went for it.
I can't seem to find her, though...
I wonder where Jatek could be...?
Huh? Why am I looking for her?
Well, because she's a friend, of course!
\!You don't think I'd be trying to get the Council back together for something bad, do you?
Heck, I'm actually glad you broke our operation up, all things considered!
You found her~! I thought I'd be wandering through these mountains for ages!
She's looking a bit... wooden, though.
\!Hmm... I'm not too sure what to do about that...
Oh well! At least she's safe!

\!
Here, take this! I've been hoping to get rid of my ill-gotten Councilor gains anyway...
You found her~! I thought I'd be wandering through these mountains for ages!
She's looking a bit... wooden, though.
\!Hmm... I'm not too sure what to do about that...
Oh well! At least she's safe!

\!
Here, take this! I've been hoping to get rid of my ill-gotten Councilor gains anyway...
I have nothing to say to traitors such as yourself and the hand you have in feeding Gianna's endless greed...
...But if you wish to rest, you may use the next tent.
...If you wish to rest, you may use the next tent.
But know that we will be watching you, Giannans.

\!
After all, who knows if you will do the same to us as you did to Tabnath...
Greetings, friends! My name is Land-Traveller, but you may call me Traveller!
Come, look at my wares! I have goods from as far away as Gianna!
I will also \C[14]purchase\C[0] any goods you no longer need! I am sure they will sell well in faraway lands!
Say, friend! Thank you for stopping by!
Ahaha!! These Forestkin friends - they are truly kindred spirits to me!
Come, look at my wares! I have goods from as far away as Gianna!
Do not curse at the customers!!
Do not curse at the customers!!
\!Come and visit Traveller, the most wonderful wandering merchant in all of Gianna~! ♫♫
Buy something and you might just make my huge dirty slut cock twitch~! ♫ Tee hee~! ♫
\!Do you like my dancing, most wonderful customer~? ♫
♫ She's got what you want in stock~ ♫\|
♫ If you buy and make her glad, ♫\|
♫ She'll let me stroke my cock~! ♫

\!
Rumor says she's got a hideout somewhere here in the Tabnath Mountains.
I've gotta admit... I'm pretty curious.

\!
In the wartime days, no one ever used puppets like they do now - being turned into a puppet was seen as a punishment.
...Or, you know, a sexy present. If you're into that.

\!
N- No way!! \!And even if I was, I couldn't tell you and ruin my peerless heroic reputation!!
